@logging_to_appins
def create_config_tables():
    '''
    Parameters:
    None

    Returns:
    None

    Actions:
    '''
    ### module imports
    from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
    import logging
    spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
    import json
    from notebookutils import mssparkutils
    import pandas as pd
    logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    from datetime import datetime, timedelta, date
    from pyspark.sql.types import StringType,BooleanType,DateType,TimestampType,IntegerType, FloatType, StructType
    from delta.tables import DeltaTable
    from croniter import croniter
    import re
    from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit
    import calendar

    ### use the ADLS gen2 assoicated with the synapse resource in any environment (DR/Dev/Stage/Prod)
    storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')

    ### create outstanding files table
    outstanding_files_table_json = spark.read.text("abfss://odw-config@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/orchestration/scheduling_outstanding_files_table.json", wholetext=True).first().value
    create_table_from_schema(outstanding_files_table_json, "odw_config_db", "raw_to_std_outstanding_files", "abfss://odw-standardised@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/", "config/raw_to_std_outstanding_files" )
